DOC.HEAD: Eds: Members who used AM-Newspaper Awards, sent Dec. 29 as a0731 under a Columbia, Mo., dateline, are asked to use the following story.
DOC.TEXT: In a story listing winners in the J.C. Penney-University of Missouri Newspaper Awards, The Associated Press misspelled the name of two writers who received a certificate of merit in the Arts and Entertainment category. They are Rick Marin of The Washington Times and Deloris Tarzan Ament of The Seattle Times. The article also misspelled the name of a writer who received a certificate of merit in the Consumer Affairs category; she is Anne Voegtlin of The Columbian in Vancouver, Wash.
